amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce section 8 spending across-the-board by a total of $2,910,252,900 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding in specified accounts by a total of $2,910,252,900 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 279 (Roll no. 274).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 279 (Roll no. 274).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Chabot.
